Tavatron:

Tavatron took her paw from his shoulder and placed it on the ground. She gazed down at Dinobot, making a mental note of the claw scratches on the floor. Tavatron bent her forelegs and then pulled herself back on her hindlegs as she transformed to robot mode. 

She crouched beside Dinobot, her snout inches from his:
"I'm glad to see you're felling better." Tavatron felt as if a weight had been lifted from her shoulders. She hadn't realized just how worried she had been:

"I don't know about you but I'm starving." Tavatron stood and gently rubbed the back of her neck. By Primus she was sore! That battle had taken more out of her than she  had realized:

"I'm going to get some food. I was wondering if you would care to accompany me." Tavatron let her hand fall to her side, absentmindedly fingering the handle of the drill sword that hung at her waist.
